title: India's Crypto Tax Shock
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on India's Crypto Tax Shock.

hook.text: In 2022, India imposed a 30% flat tax on all crypto gains plus a 1% tax deducted on every transaction.

buildup.text: The 1% TDS (tax deducted at source) meant every trade was taxed immediately, crushing trading volume on Indian exchanges.

discovery.text: Indian trading volume dropped over 90% on local exchanges. Traders moved to offshore platforms to avoid the taxes.

twist.text: India collected far less tax revenue than expected. Punitive rates drove activity offshore rather than generating income.

climax.text: India's approach showed that excessive taxation can be as harmful as bans. Regulation must balance revenue with market reality.

punchline.text: Taxed crypto at 30%. Collected almost nothing. The traders left.

quiz.question: What effect did India's crypto taxes have?
options: Trading volume dropped 90% as users moved to offshore platforms
